data.message: Why don't messages from not-friends come into the same inbox in facebook? Why do they go into the folder Other which is not in Messenger? I miss out on messages that way :(

replies.message: Hi Henni. You can change your filter preferences directly from your inbox. You can move a message to your inbox by replying to it, or by opening the message and selecting Move to Inbox from the Actions menu. For more information, please visit our Help Center at:  https://www.facebook.com/help/www/188872764494245 -Hailey

Thank you, i'll try that. 
Another thing, I'm really not happy about the way you have changed the way news feed works. Annoying that it does not show all the posts from all the pages i have liked, in stead it narrows down the views more and more. In stead i have to make an interest list and use that in stead.
